General.Name: Treasury Metals Inc
General.Description: Treasury Metals Inc. operates as a gold exploration and development company in Canada. The company focuses on its 100%-owned Goliath Gold Complex, which includes the Goliath Project, Goldlund Project, and Miller Project. The company was formerly known as Divine Lake Exploration Inc. and changed its name to Treasury Metals Inc. in November 2007. Treasury Metals Inc. was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 15 Toronto Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5C 2E3
